casebody.data:
William K. ERRICO, an Individual; and William Errico & Associates, P.C., a Nevada Professional Corporation, Appellants,
v.
Sandra STAHL, as Successor Guardian of the Estate of Wilfred Richard-James Bosserman, an Incapacitated Adult Individual, Respondent. No. 74663 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 19, 2019

AFFIRMED.
